USER-ROLES: SELECT id, roleName, description, createdById FROM user_role
USER-ROLE: SELECT id, roleName, description, createdById FROM user_role WHERE id = ?
USERS: SELECT id, userName, password, userRoleId, createdById FROM user
USER: SELECT id, userName, password, userRoleId, createdById FROM user WHERE id = ?
ACCOUNT-TYPES: SELECT id, accountTypeName, description, createdById FROM account_type
ACCOUNT-TYPE: SELECT id, accountTypeName, description, createdById FROM account_type WHERE id = ?
TRANSACTION-TYPES: SELECT id, displayName, importName, accountTypeId, createdById FROM transaction_type
TRANSACTION-TYPE: SELECT id, displayName, importName, accountTypeId, createdById FROM transaction_type WHERE id = ?
TRANSACTION-TYPES-BY-ACCOUNT-TYPE: SELECT id, displayname, importName, accountTypeId, createdById FROM transaction_type WHERE accountTypeId = ?
TENANTS: SELECT id, tenantName, createdById FROM tenant
TENANT: SELECT id, tenantName, createdById FROM tenant WHERE id = ?
BANKS: SELECT id, name, externalOrg, externalId, createdById FROM bank
BANK: SELECT id, name, externalOrg, externalId, createdById FROM bank WHERE id = ?
BANKBYEXTERNAL: SELECT id, name externalOrg, externalId, createdById FROM bank WHERE externalOrg = ? AND externalId = ?
ACCOUNTS: SELECT id, accountNum, displayName, accountTypeId, tenantId, bankId, createdById FROM account
ACCOUNT: SELECT id, accountNum, displayName, accountTypeId, tenantId, bankId, createdById FROM account WHERE id = ?
ACCOUNTBYBANKANDNUMBER: SELECT id, accountNum, displayName, accountTypeId, tenantId, bankId, createdById FROM account WHERE accountNum = ? AND bankId = ?
CATEGORY-TYPES: SELECT id, categoryTypeName, createdById FROM category_type
CATEGORY-TYPE: SELECT id, categoryTypeName, createdById FROM category_type WHERE id = ?
CATEGORIES: SELECT id, categoryTypeId, categoryName, createdById FROM category
CATEGORY: SELECT id, categoryTypeId, categoryName, createdById FROM category WHERE id = ?
SUBCATEGORIES: SELECT id, subcategoryName, categoryId, createdById FROM subcategory
SUBCATEGORIESBYCAT: SELECT id, subcategoryName, categoryId, createdById, FROM subcategory WHERE accountId = ?
SUBCATEGORY: SELECT id, subcategoryName, categoryId, createdById FROM subcategory WHERE id = ?
PAYEES: SELECT id, payeeName, defaultSubCategoryId, createdById FROM payee
PAYEE: SELECT id, payeeName, defaultSubCategoryId, createdById FROM payee WHERE id = ?
PAYEE-MAPS: SELECT id, payeeImportName, mappedPayeeId from payee_import_map
PAYEE-MAP: SELECT id, payeeImportName, mappedPayeeId from payee_import_map WHERE id = ?
PAYEE-MAP-BY-PAYEE: SELECT id, payeeImportName, mappedPayeeId from payee_import_map WHERE mappedPayeeId = ?
